readable.title: 871290646_307cddd4e7
readable.content: A clown dressed in red and yellow holds something to his mouth . A man with black hair is wearing a red and yellow shirt and has a yellow clown nose and face makeup on . A person is wearing mime makeup and glasses on his head as he looks at the camera . A person wearing clown makeup points a fake gun at the camera . A person with black hair is dressed like a clown .
